amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funds available for procurement of the V-22 Osprey aircraft and to put the savings toward deficit reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 112-485 to eliminate funds available for procurement of the V-22 Osprey aircraft, and puts the savings toward deficit reduction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Quigley.
